    ll arr[21];

    FOR(i,2,21)
    {
        if (i % 2 == 0)
        {
            arr[i] = arr[i-1]*i+1;
        }
        else
            arr[i] = arr[i-1]*i-1;
    }

    int tc,n;

        printf("%lld\n",arr[n]);
